attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister's constant smiling in interviews is 1. off-putting and detracts from the seriousness of the situation, 2. makes him look a fool and open to ridicule, 3. makes him look as though he doesn't appreciate the seriousness of the issues he is discussing, 4. makes him look as though he is patronising the voters and results in making them feel alienated and 5. does not inspire anybody's confidence in him as leader of our country.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
